select erpv.value, param.name, param.remark from ent_risk_param_value erpv inner join param on (param.id=erpv.param_id and param.valid=1) inner join template_mapping_param tmp on (tmp.param_id=param.id and tmp.valid=1) inner join param_template_category ptc on (ptc.param_template_id = tmp.template_id and ptc.valid = 1) where
erpv.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and
ptc.type = #{templateType} and
erpv.valid=1

select sum(total) from ( SELECT count(p.id) AS total FROM product_info p INNER JOIN risk_material rm ON p.`name` = rm.chinese_generic_name INNER JOIN enterprise_mapping_product emp ON emp.prod_id = p.id AND emp.is_main_product = 1 AND emp.ent_id = #{enterpriseId} INNER JOIN risk_material_param_value rmpv ON rmpv.material_id = rm.id INNER JOIN template_mapping_param tmp ON tmp.param_id = rmpv.param_id INNER JOIN param_template_category ptc ON ptc.param_template_id = tmp.template_id AND ptc.type = 'stability' where rmpv.`value` = '1' UNION ALL select count(p.id) AS total from param p INNER JOIN template_mapping_param tmp ON tmp.param_id = p.id INNER JOIN ent_risk_param_value erpv ON erpv.param_id = p.id AND erpv.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} INNER JOIN param_template_category ptc ON ptc.param_template_id = tmp.template_id AND ptc.type = 'gradual_risk' INNER JOIN risk_material rm ON p.`name` = rm.chinese_generic_name INNER JOIN risk_material_param_value rmpv ON rmpv.material_id = rm.id INNER JOIN template_mapping_param tmp2 ON tmp2.param_id = rmpv.param_id INNER JOIN param_template_category ptc2 ON ptc2.param_template_id = tmp2.template_id AND ptc2.type = 'stability' where rmpv.`value` = '1' ) a
